titles.title: Veterans Legal Support Act of 2022
Veterans Legal Support Act of 2022
To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide support to university law school programs that are designed to provide legal assistance to veterans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Veterans Legal Support Act of 2022
This bill authorizes the Department of Veterans Affairs to provide support, including financial support, to one or more university law school programs to provide veterans with legal assistance.
